commit message:
Tweak pink board color

IMO it looked too much like orange

Clean up SettingsActivity and how GameActivity handles Settings

SettingsActivity was returning updated settings to GameActivity
via an Intent, and GameActivity was then updating the settings
in SharedPreferences. This was unnecessary as SettingsActivity
could just edit the SharedPreferences itself.
Fix new game starting without changing settings
Use a custom view for color buttons
Make SettingsActivity get settings from SharedPrefs rather than passing via Intent
Clean how settings are handled in SettingsActivity.java
Adjust text on color buttons so that it always fits
